text: Martine Carrillon-Couvreur Martine Carrillon-Couvreur (born 21 March 1948) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represented the 1st constituency of the Nièvre department from 2002 to 2017, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Martine Carrillon-Couvreur
